## Protocol.DOMDebugger.GetEventListenersRequest.depth property

The maximum depth at which Node children should be retrieved, defaults to 1. Use -1 for the entire subtree or provide an integer larger than 0.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
depth?: integer;
```
